title: Major Tobacco Card List- for Sale
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Major Tobacco Card List- for Sale
posts.post_content:
Posted By: barrysloate
TERMS
1) Cards offered to the first person who says "I'll take it." If you ask for a scan I will give you a short grace period, but ask that you please make a decision ASAP, as there may be somebody right behind you.
2) All cards sent postpaid and insured. NY residents please include 8% sales tax.
3) Check or money preferred. Paypal accepted but please add 3%.
4) Either post your requests on this thread or direct inquiries to Barry Sloate at bsloate@att.net or call 718-855-7513 between 9:00 AM and 6:00 PM. Thank you
